description_text:
Hey guys looking at getting the Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with

conversations.body_text: Hi lochlan mcdonald,     Please check the dimensions of the pedal; it appears to be compatible. Also, please verify the dimensions of the inverted mounting bracket to ensure everything fits properly.
